name: Acidic Sliver
text: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: This permanent deals 2 damage to target creature or player."
flavor: The first sliver burst against the cave wall, and others piled in behind to deepen the new tunnel.
title: Acidic Sliver

name: Aftershock
text: Destroy target artifact, creature, or land. Aftershock deals 3 damage to you.
flavor:
"Every act of destruction has a repercussion."
—Karn, silver golem
title: Aftershock

name: Aluren
text: Any player may play creature cards with converted mana cost 3 or less without paying their mana cost and as though they had flash.
flavor:
Squee bounced up and down. "I sees a horsey, an' a piggy, an' a—"
"If you don't shut up," hissed Mirri, "you'll see a kidney and a spleeny."
title: Aluren

name: Anarchist
text: When Anarchist enters the battlefield, you may return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "I'll take that. You won't need it when the revolution comes."
title: Anarchist

name: Angelic Blessing
text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor: Only the warrior who can admit mortal weakness will be bolstered by immortal strength.
title: Angelic Blessing

name: Angelic Protector
text:
Flying
Whenever Angelic Protector becomes the target of a spell or ability, Angelic Protector gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor:
"My family sheltered in her light, the dark was content to wait."
—Crovax
title: Angelic Protector

name: Anoint
text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
title: Anoint

name: Armor Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures have "{2}: This creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn."
flavor:
Hanna: "We must learn how they protect each other."
Mirri: "After they're done trying to kill us, all right?"
title: Armor Sliver

name: Armored Pegasus
text: Flying
flavor:
"I always charge a little extra to take on a pegasus. They fly like eagles, kick like mules, and hide like hermits."
—Tahli en-Dal, bounty hunter
title: Armored Pegasus

name: Avenging Angel
text:
Flying
When Avenging Angel dies, you may put it on top of its owner's library.
title: Avenging Angel

name: Bandage
text:
Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor: Takara shook with guilt. She knew the last image her father had seen was her sword flashing toward him.
title: Bandage

name: Barbed Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures have "{2}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
flavor: Spans of spines leapt from one sliver to the next, forming a deadly hedge around the Weatherlight.
title: Barbed Sliver

name: Bottle Gnomes
text: Sacrifice Bottle Gnomes: You gain 3 life.
flavor:
"I am reminded of the fable of the silver egg. Its owner cracks it open to see what jewels it holds, only to discover a simple yellow yolk."
—Karn, silver golem
title: Bottle Gnomes

name: Caldera Lake
text:
Caldera Lake enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool. Caldera Lake deals 1 damage to you.
title: Caldera Lake

name: Cannibalize
text: Choose two target creatures controlled by the same player. Exile one of those creatures and put two +1/+1 counters on the other.
flavor: "Mine."
title: Cannibalize

name: Canopy Spider
text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor:
"We know our place in the cycle of life—and it is not as flies."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves
title: Canopy Spider

name: Canyon Wildcat
text: Mountainwalk
flavor: "Relative of yours?" Ertai teased. Mirri simply sneered.
title: Canyon Wildcat

name: Capsize
text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
title: Capsize

name: Carnassid
text:
Trample
{1}{G}: Regenerate Carnassid.
flavor: The hunter would never forget the time or place where he first met the carnassid, for they buried him there.
title: Carnassid

name: Carnophage
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, tap Carnophage unless you pay 1 life.
flavor: Eating is all it knows.
title: Carnophage

name: Cataclysm
text: Each player chooses from among the permanents he or she controls an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a land, then sacrifices the rest.
flavor: The Weatherlight dragged the Predator behind it, the cradle hauling the casket.
title: Cataclysm

name: Charging Paladin
text: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor: "Hope shall be the blade that severs our bonds."
title: Charging Paladin

name: Cinder Marsh
text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Cinder Marsh doesn't untap during your next untap step.
title: Cinder Marsh

name: City of Traitors
text:
When you play another land, sacrifice City of Traitors.
{T}: Add {2} to your mana pool.
flavor:
"While we fought, the il surrendered."
—Oracle en-Vec
title: City of Traitors

name: Clot Sliver
text: All Slivers have "{2}: Regenerate this permanent."
flavor:
"One would think I would be accustomed to unexpected returns."
—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator
title: Clot Sliver

name: Coat of Arms
text: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)
flavor:
"Hup, two, three, four,
Dunno how to count no more."
—Mogg march
title: Coat of Arms

name: Coercion
text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor:
"There's very little that escapes me, Greven. And you will escape very little if you fail."
—Volrath
title: Coercion

name: Coffin Queen
text:
You may choose not to untap Coffin Queen during your untap step.
{2}{B}, {T}: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. When Coffin Queen becomes untapped or you lose control of Coffin Queen, exile that creature.
title: Coffin Queen

name: Coiled Tinviper
text: First strike
flavor: The bite of the tinviper feels most like a razor drawn across the tongue.
title: Coiled Tinviper

name: Commander Greven il-Vec
text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
When Commander Greven il-Vec enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature.
flavor: "Rage is the only freedom left to me."
title: Commander Greven il-Vec

name: Conviction
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.
{W}: Return Conviction to its owner's hand.
flavor: It was not the minotaur's shoulders but his soul that bore the heaviest weight.
title: Conviction

name: Corpse Dance
text:
Buyback {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Return the top creature card of your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
title: Corpse Dance

name: Counterspell
text: Counter target spell.
flavor:
"It was probably a lousy spell in the first place."
—Ertai, wizard adept
title: Counterspell

name: Crashing Boars
text: Whenever Crashing Boars attacks, defending player chooses an untapped creature he or she controls. That creature blocks Crashing Boars this turn if able.
flavor: Bores ruin a party. Boars are party to ruin.
title: Crashing Boars

name: Craven Giant
text: Craven Giant can't block.
flavor:
What is high as a mountain and low as a snake?
—Dal riddle
title: Craven Giant

name: Crovax the Cursed
text:
Crovax the Cursed enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Crovax. If you don't, remove a +1/+1 counter from Crovax.
{B}: Crovax gains flying until end of turn.
title: Crovax the Cursed

name: Crystalline Sliver
text: All Slivers have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
flavor: Bred as living shields, these slivers have proven unruly—they know they cannot be caught.
title: Crystalline Sliver

name: Curiosity
text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.
flavor: All Mirri wanted to do was rest, but she couldn't ignore a nagging suspicion as she followed Crovax's skulking form.
title: Curiosity

name: Cursed Flesh
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor: A farewell to arms . . . and feet . . . and legs . . .
title: Cursed Flesh

name: Cursed Scroll
text: {3}, {T}: Name a card. Reveal a card at random from your hand. If it's the named card, Cursed Scroll deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
title: Cursed Scroll

name: Dark Banishing
text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor:
"It is the way of most wizards to begin by exiling themselves and to end by exiling everyone else."
—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator
title: Dark Banishing

name: Dark Ritual
text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
flavor:
"If there is such a thing as too much power, I have not discovered it."
—Volrath
title: Dark Ritual

name: Dauthi Horror
text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Dauthi Horror can't be blocked by white creatures.
title: Dauthi Horror

name: Dauthi Jackal
text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
{B}{B}, Sacrifice Dauthi Jackal: Destroy target blocking creature.
flavor:
"All dauthi are jackals, regardless of breed."
—Lyna, soltari emissary
title: Dauthi Jackal

name: Dauthi Marauder
text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
flavor:
"The dauthi came from beneath the ruins one night, and the darkness cast them in the best possible light."
—Soltari Tales of Life
title: Dauthi Marauder

name: Dauthi Slayer
text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Dauthi Slayer attacks each turn if able.
flavor:
"They have knives for every soul."
—Lyna, soltari emissary
title: Dauthi Slayer

name: Dauthi Warlord
text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Dauthi Warlord's power is equal to the number of creatures with shadow on the battlefield.
title: Dauthi Warlord

name: Deadshot
text: Tap target creature. It deals damage equal to its power to another target creature.
flavor:
"Carrion! Keep your distance. My blade will come to you!"
—Crovax
title: Deadshot

name: Death Pits of Rath
text: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, destroy it. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: As the sludge below began to shift and take shapes, Gerrard turned from the railing to Orim. "I suppose," he said, "it's a little too late for prayer, isn't it?"
title: Death Pits of Rath

name: Death Stroke
text: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor: For a sharp second, Selenia froze, and Crovax's blade found home. As the angel shattered like glass, Crovax felt his mind collapse—the curse had been fulfilled.
title: Death Stroke

name: Death's Duet
text: Return two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Life has always been a dance. It is only fitting that death sing the tune.
title: Death's Duet

name: Diabolic Edict
text: Target player sacrifices a creature.
flavor: Greven il-Vec lifted Vhati off his feet. "The fall will give you time to think on your failure."
title: Diabolic Edict

name: Disenchant
text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: The swarm seemed unmoved by the artificial slivers' destruction. "They clearly were not the leaders," Hanna cursed. "I guess we'll have to do this the hard way."
title: Disenchant

name: Dismiss
text:
Counter target spell.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"There is nothing you can do that I cannot simply deny."
—Ertai, wizard adept
title: Dismiss

name: Dracoplasm
text:
Flying
As Dracoplasm enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of creatures. Dracoplasm's power becomes the total power of those creatures and its toughness becomes their total toughness.
{R}: Dracoplasm gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
title: Dracoplasm

name: Dream Halls
text: Rather than pay the mana cost for a spell, its controller may discard a card that shares a color with that spell.
flavor: Within without.
title: Dream Halls

name: Dream Prowler
text: Dream Prowler can't be blocked as long as it's attacking alone.
flavor:
"To think that some find sleep a restful state."
—Volrath
title: Dream Prowler

name: Dungeon Shade
text:
Flying
{B}: Dungeon Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: A sickness stirs in its eyes, a nightmare born in darkened wails.
title: Dungeon Shade

name: Elven Rite
text: Distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures.
flavor: As the bough stretches, so shall you grow. As the roots spread, so shall you thrive.
title: Elven Rite

name: Elvish Fury
text:
Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
title: Elvish Fury

name: Emmessi Tome
text: {5}, {T}: Draw two cards, then discard a card.
flavor: It is like life and destiny: we think we know the story, but we have read only half the tale.
title: Emmessi Tome

name: Endangered Armodon
text: When you control a creature with toughness 2 or less, sacrifice Endangered Armodon.
flavor: These are its last days. It is doomed to be remembered only until the hunters hunger again.
title: Endangered Armodon

name: Ephemeron
text:
Flying
Discard a card: Return Ephemeron to its owner's hand.
flavor: From nothing came teeth.
title: Ephemeron

name: Erratic Portal
text: {1}, {T}: Return target creature to its owner's hand unless its controller pays {1}.
flavor: "In Barrin's name!" cried Lyna as Hanna's sword passed through her, "Ertai sends word that the portal is open—but not for long!"
title: Erratic Portal

name: Evincar's Justice
text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Evincar's Justice deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.
title: Evincar's Justice

name: Exalted Dragon
text:
Flying
Exalted Dragon can't attack unless you sacrifice a land. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)
flavor: If dragons excel at anything more than vanity, it is greed.
title: Exalted Dragon

name: Fanning the Flames
text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Fanning the Flames deals X damage to target creature or player.
title: Fanning the Flames

name: Field of Souls
text: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
title: Field of Souls

name: Fighting Drake
text: Flying
flavor: Two things are needed to survive the harsh skies of Rath: a thick hide and a thicker skull.
title: Fighting Drake

name: Flame Wave
text: Flame Wave deals 4 damage to target player and each creature he or she controls.
flavor:
"I hear the roaring of a wave whose waters are red and whose mists are black."
—Oracle en-Vec
title: Flame Wave

name: Flowstone Blade
text:
Enchant creature
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Remember the fable of the elf who came upon a cave of gold. In trying to free the largest piece, she was crushed by its weight."
—Karn, silver golem
title: Flowstone Blade

name: Flowstone Mauler
text:
Trample
{R}: Flowstone Mauler gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Once these horrifying creatures were perfected, there was no need for armodons.
title: Flowstone Mauler

name: Flowstone Wyvern
text:
Flying
{R}: Flowstone Wyvern gets +2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Where I come from, stone stays on the ground."
—Tahngarth of the Weatherlight
title: Flowstone Wyvern

name: Forbid
text:
Buyback—Discard two cards. (You may discard two cards in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Counter target spell.
title: Forbid

name: Fugue
text: Target player discards three cards.
flavor: "My ship . . . ," Sisay mumbled. "Intact," Gerrard reassured her, "which is more than I can say for you, my friend." Sisay laughed despite the pain.
title: Fugue

name: Furnace Brood
text: {R}: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn.
flavor: Furnace air crackles with magmatic cackles.
title: Furnace Brood

name: Gallantry
text:
Target blocking creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor: "Forgive me," Mirri whispered. "I thought you a burden, and you saved my life." Hanna quietly accepted the apology.
title: Gallantry

name: Gaseous Form
text:
Enchant creature
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.
flavor:
"It's hard to hurt anyone when you're as transparent as your motives."
—Ertai, wizard adept
title: Gaseous Form

name: Gerrard's Battle Cry
text: {2}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: Gerrard grinned and drew his sword. "This won't be a fair fight," he called to his crew. "They should have brought a second ship!"
title: Gerrard's Battle Cry

name: Goblin Bombardment
text: Sacrifice a creature: Goblin Bombardment deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: One mogg to aim the catapult, one mogg to steer the rock.
title: Goblin Bombardment

name: Gravedigger
text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: A full coffin is like a full coffer—both are attractive to thieves.
title: Gravedigger

name: Grindstone
text: {3}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. If both cards share a color, repeat this process.
flavor:
"Memory is a burden that wears at the soul as weather wears at stone."
—Crovax
title: Grindstone

name: Hammerhead Shark
text: Hammerhead Shark can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
flavor: Cross the eyes of a hammerhead and you'll dot its teeth.
title: Hammerhead Shark

name: Harrow
text:
As an additional cost to cast Harrow, sacrifice a land.
Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: Changing Rath's landscape is like tearing the scab from a wound.
title: Harrow

name: Heartwood Dryad
text: Heartwood Dryad can block creatures with shadow as though Heartwood Dryad had shadow.
flavor: To snare what lies between worlds takes the patient reach of trees.
title: Heartwood Dryad

name: Heartwood Giant
text: {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Heartwood Giant deals 2 damage to target player.
flavor: Wind in the trees is soothing, but the same can't be said for trees on the wind.
title: Heartwood Giant

name: Hermit Druid
text: {G}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a basic land card. Put that card into your hand and all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.
flavor: Seeking the company of plants ensures that your wits will go to seed.
title: Hermit Druid

name: Hibernation Sliver
text: All Slivers have "Pay 2 life: Return this permanent to its owner's hand."
flavor: Mogglings have been known to play ball with hibernating slivers, completely unaware of their true nature.
title: Hibernation Sliver

name: Horned Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures have trample.
flavor: A bristling wave of slivers broke against the Weatherlight's timbers.
title: Horned Sliver

name: Horned Turtle
flavor:
"So like men are they: a hardened shell with fragile flesh beneath."
—Selenia, dark angel
title: Horned Turtle

name: Humility
text: All creatures lose all abilities and have base power and toughness 1/1.
flavor:
"One cannot cleanse the wounds of failure."
—Karn, silver golem
title: Humility

name: Intuition
text: Search your library for three cards and reveal them. Target opponent chooses one. Put that card into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.
title: Intuition

name: Jinxed Idol
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, Jinxed Idol deals 2 damage to you.
Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent gains control of Jinxed Idol.
flavor: "Here."
title: Jinxed Idol

name: Kezzerdrix
text:
First strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, if your opponents control no creatures, Kezzerdrix deals 4 damage to you.
title: Kezzerdrix

name: Killer Whale
text: {U}: Killer Whale gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: Hunger is like the sea: deep, endless, and unforgiving.
title: Killer Whale

name: Kindle
text: Kindle deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Kindle in all graveyards.
flavor: Hope of deliverance is scorched by the fire of futility.
title: Kindle

name: Kor Chant
text: All damage that would be dealt this turn to target creature you control by a source of your choice is dealt to another target creature instead.
flavor: The true treasure no thief can touch.
title: Kor Chant

name: Krakilin
text:
Krakilin enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{G}: Regenerate Krakilin.
flavor:
"A perfect reflection of its world: brutal, fetal, and lacking truth."
—Oracle en-Vec
title: Krakilin

name: Lab Rats
text:
Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Put a 1/1 black Rat creature token onto the battlefield.
title: Lab Rats

name: Legacy's Allure
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a treasure counter on Legacy's Allure.
Sacrifice Legacy's Allure: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of treasure counters on Legacy's Allure. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
title: Legacy's Allure

name: Legerdemain
text: Exchange control of target artifact or creature and another target permanent that shares one of those types with it. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
flavor: Squee tucked the warm ball in his pocket and slipped a pebble in its place. "Glok," he mumbled, and hid.
title: Legerdemain

name: Lightning Blast
text: Lightning Blast deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
flavor:
"Those who fear the darkness have never seen what the light can do."
—Selenia, dark angel
title: Lightning Blast

name: Living Death
text: Each player exiles all creature cards from his or her graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts all cards he or she exiled this way onto the battlefield.
title: Living Death

name: Lotus Petal
text: {T}, Sacrifice Lotus Petal: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
flavor: "Hard to imagine," mused Hanna, stroking the petal, "such a lovely flower inspiring such greed."
title: Lotus Petal

name: Lowland Basilisk
text: Whenever Lowland Basilisk deals damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
flavor: Unlike their cousins, Rathi basilisks turn their victims into puddles of flowstone.
title: Lowland Basilisk

name: Lowland Giant
flavor: "Faugh!" snorted Tahngarth. "Why would it make a meal of something like you?" Squee looked relieved. "No," he continued, "you'd make a much better toothpick."
title: Lowland Giant

name: Mage il-Vec
text: {T}, Discard a card at random: Mage il-Vec deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Living below a flowstone foundry produces a disproportionate number of fire mages among the il.
title: Mage il-Vec

name: Magmasaur
text:
Magmasaur enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove a +1/+1 counter from Magmasaur. If you don't, sacrifice Magmasaur and it deals damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to each creature without flying and each player.
title: Magmasaur

name: Mana Leak
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor:
"The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy."
—Volrath
title: Mana Leak

name: Manabond
text: At the beginning of your end step, you may reveal your hand and put all land cards from it onto the battlefield. If you do, discard your hand.
title: Manabond

name: Maniacal Rage
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
flavor: Only by sacrificing any semblance of defense could Gerrard best Greven.
title: Maniacal Rage

name: Master Decoy
text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor:
"A skilled decoy can throw your enemies off your trail. A master decoy can survive to do it again."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight
title: Master Decoy

name: Mawcor
text:
Flying
{T}: Mawcor deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: From its maw comes neither word nor whisper—only wind.
title: Mawcor

name: Maze of Shadows
text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Untap target attacking creature with shadow. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.
title: Maze of Shadows

name: Meditate
text: Draw four cards. You skip your next turn.
flavor:
"Part of me believes that Barrin taught me meditation simply to shut me up."
—Ertai, wizard adept
title: Meditate

name: Merfolk Looter
text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor: In the depths of Rootwater, salvage and sewage differ only in texture.
title: Merfolk Looter

name: Metallic Sliver
flavor: When the clever counterfeit was accepted by the hive, Volrath's influence upon the slivers grew even stronger.
title: Metallic Sliver

name: Mindless Automaton
text:
Mindless Automaton enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mindless Automaton.
Remove two +1/+1 counters from Mindless Automaton: Draw a card.
title: Mindless Automaton

name: Mirri, Cat Warrior
text: First strike, forestwalk, vigilance (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike, it can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest, and attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor:
"Full of beauty and grace, with a predator's instincts . . . Although she wanders, I have always thought Mirri belongs in Llanowar most of all."
—Rofellos, Llanowar emissary
title: Mirri, Cat Warrior

name: Mnemonic Sliver
text: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: Draw a card."
flavor:
"A jigsaw puzzle that lives, breeds, and thinks."
—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator
title: Mnemonic Sliver

name: Mogg Conscripts
text: Mogg Conscripts can't attack unless you've cast a creature spell this turn.
flavor:
"Torahn's horns! They've seen us. Now, statue, you must fight to save yourself!"
—Tahngarth, aboard the Predator
title: Mogg Conscripts

name: Mogg Fanatic
text: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: Mogg Fanatic deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: "I got it! I got it! I—"
title: Mogg Fanatic

name: Mogg Flunkies
text: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.
flavor: They'll attack whatever's in front of them—as long as you tell them where that is.
title: Mogg Flunkies

name: Mogg Hollows
text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. Mogg Hollows doesn't untap during your next untap step.
title: Mogg Hollows

name: Mogg Infestation
text: Destroy all creatures target player controls. For each creature that died this way, put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield under that player's control.
title: Mogg Infestation

name: Mogg Maniac
text: Whenever Mogg Maniac is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent.
flavor: Stand clear if he gets an itch.
title: Mogg Maniac

name: Mounted Archers
text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
{W}: Mounted Archers can block an additional creature this turn.
title: Mounted Archers

name: Mox Diamond
text:
If Mox Diamond would enter the battlefield, you may discard a land card instead. If you do, put Mox Diamond onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard.
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
title: Mox Diamond

name: Mulch
text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
flavor: Hope is the one crop that can grow in any climate.
title: Mulch

name: Muscle Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures get +1/+1.
flavor: The air was filled with the cracks and snaps of flesh hardening as the new sliver joined the battle.
title: Muscle Sliver

name: Necrologia
text:
Cast Necrologia only during your end step.
As an additional cost to cast Necrologia, pay X life.
Draw X cards.
flavor:
"My enemies' death yields threefold benefit: removal, reuse, and research."
—Volrath
title: Necrologia

name: Needle Storm
text: Needle Storm deals 4 damage to each creature with flying.
flavor: The rain is driven like nails.
title: Needle Storm

name: Nomads en-Kor
text: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Nomads en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.
flavor: The kor forsake roots for the winding of the path, forsake voices for the silence of the mind, forsake all else for the poverty of isolation.
title: Nomads en-Kor

name: Oath of Druids
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player who controls more creatures than he or she does and is his or her opponent. The first player may reveal cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a creature card. If he or she does, that player puts that card onto the battlefield and all other cards revealed this way into his or her graveyard.
title: Oath of Druids

name: Ogre Shaman
text: {2}, Discard a card at random: Ogre Shaman deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Ogre shamans must be bright enough to learn their invocations and dim enough to use them.
title: Ogre Shaman

name: Orim, Samite Healer
text: {T}: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
flavor:
"The silkworm spins itself a new existence. So the healer weaves the threads of life."
—Orim, Samite healer
title: Orim, Samite Healer

name: Overrun
text: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.
flavor:
"You want to know your enemy? Look at your feet while you trample him."
—Tahngarth of the Weatherlight
title: Overrun

name: Pacifism
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor: Frozen by conscience, Karn did not resist as the moggs carried him to the Predator.
title: Pacifism

name: Paladin en-Vec
text: First strike, protection from black and from red (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike. It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black or red.)
flavor: "Our belief shall be the lance that pierces Volrath's heart."
title: Paladin en-Vec

name: Pandemonium
text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, that creature's controller may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature or player of his or her choice.
flavor:
"If we cannot live proudly, we die so!"
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves
title: Pandemonium

name: Patchwork Gnomes
text: Discard a card: Regenerate Patchwork Gnomes.
flavor:
"Just when I get them working, they always start fighting and tearing at each other for spare parts."
—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator
title: Patchwork Gnomes

name: Pegasus Stampede
text:
Buyback—Sacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Put a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
title: Pegasus Stampede

name: Phyrexian Hulk
flavor:
"They are convenient in having no souls, but less so in having no spirit."
—Volrath
title: Phyrexian Hulk

name: Pine Barrens
text:
Pine Barrens enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool. Pine Barrens deals 1 damage to you.
title: Pine Barrens

name: Provoke
text:
Untap target creature you don't control. That creature blocks this turn if able.
Draw a card.
flavor: Mirri did not have time to think, only to react.
title: Provoke

name: Rampant Growth
text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: Rath forces plants from its surface as one presses whey from cheese.
title: Rampant Growth

name: Rathi Dragon
text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Rathi Dragon enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice two Mountains.
flavor:
Wrap the flame as twine,
Kingdoms will be thine.
title: Rathi Dragon

name: Rats of Rath
text: {B}: Destroy target artifact, creature, or land you control.
flavor:
"These creatures offer new challenges in the scrutiny of entrails."
—Oracle en-Vec
title: Rats of Rath

name: Reality Anchor
text:
Target creature loses shadow until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"See how you like it."
—Ertai, wizard adept
title: Reality Anchor

name: Reanimate
text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.
flavor:
"You will learn to earn death."
—Volrath
title: Reanimate

name: Recurring Nightmare
text: Sacrifice a creature, Return Recurring Nightmare to its owner's hand: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor:
"I am confined by sleep and defined by nightmare."
—Crovax
title: Recurring Nightmare

name: Recycle
text:
Skip your draw step.
Whenever you play a card, draw a card.
Your maximum hand size is two.
title: Recycle

name: Renegade Warlord
text:
First strike
Whenever Renegade Warlord attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"His tongue must be honey, the way he gathers ants to fight with him."
—Volrath
title: Renegade Warlord

name: Repentance
text: Target creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.
flavor:
"The cannon wasn't aimed at you!" pleaded Vhati.
"I'm not sure which is more pathetic," replied Greven, "your judgment or your aim."
title: Repentance

name: Revenant
text:
Flying
Revenant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
flavor:
"Not again."
—Hans
title: Revenant

name: Rolling Thunder
text: Rolling Thunder deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
flavor: "Such rage," thought Vhati, gazing up at the thunderhead from the Predator. "It is Greven's mind manifest."
title: Rolling Thunder

name: Rootbreaker Wurm
text: Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)
flavor: As Gerrard made his escape, the wurm covered his flight by helping itself to three great mouthfuls of merfolk.
title: Rootbreaker Wurm

name: Rootwalla
text: {1}{G}: Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavor: If you try to sneak up on a rootwalla, you'll suddenly find yourself dealing with twice the lizard.
title: Rootwalla

name: Rootwater Depths
text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. Rootwater Depths doesn't untap during your next untap step.
title: Rootwater Depths

name: Rootwater Hunter
text: {T}: Rootwater Hunter deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor:
"Bitter water, vicious wave;
Shadow-cold shallows, root-made maze.
Home's angry embrace."
—Rootwater Saga
title: Rootwater Hunter

name: Sabertooth Wyvern
text: Flying, first strike
flavor: Most creatures grow out of their baby teeth, but sabertooth wyverns grow into theirs.
title: Sabertooth Wyvern

name: Salt Flats
text:
Salt Flats enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. Salt Flats deals 1 damage to you.
title: Salt Flats

name: Sandstone Warrior
text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
{R}: Sandstone Warrior gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"I used to describe something stable as ‘rock solid.' So much for that expression."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight
title: Sandstone Warrior

name: Sarcomancy
text:
When Sarcomancy enters the battlefield, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no Zombies on the battlefield, Sarcomancy deals 1 damage to you.
title: Sarcomancy

name: Scabland
text:
Scabland enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool. Scabland deals 1 damage to you.
title: Scabland

name: Screeching Harpy
text:
Flying
{1}{B}: Regenerate Screeching Harpy.
flavor:
"They are called ‘fowl' for a reason."
—Mirri of the Weatherlight
title: Screeching Harpy

name: Scrivener
text: When Scrivener enters the battlefield, you may return target instant card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor:
"History is a potent weapon."
—Karn, silver golem
title: Scrivener

name: Sea Monster
text: Sea Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
flavor: Water is life. Or perhaps it is just something to wash it down with.
title: Sea Monster

name: Searing Touch
text:
Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Searing Touch deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
title: Searing Touch

name: Seething Anger
text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
title: Seething Anger

name: Selenia, Dark Angel
text:
Flying
Pay 2 life: Return Selenia, Dark Angel to its owner's hand.
flavor: "I am light. I am dark. I must give my life to serve; not even death can release me."
title: Selenia, Dark Angel

name: Serpent Warrior
text: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.
flavor: A hiss before dying.
title: Serpent Warrior

name: Shackles
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
{W}: Return Shackles to its owner's hand.
flavor: Shackles of gold are still shackles.
title: Shackles

name: Shadow Rift
text:
Target creature gains shadow until end of turn. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Draw a card.
title: Shadow Rift

name: Shadowstorm
text: Shadowstorm deals 2 damage to each creature with shadow.
flavor:
"You've not seen a storm until you've seen the kind that roars between worlds."
—Lyna, soltari emissary
title: Shadowstorm

name: Shaman en-Kor
text:
{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Shaman en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.
{1}{W}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, that damage is dealt to Shaman en-Kor instead.
title: Shaman en-Kor

name: Shard Phoenix
text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Sacrifice Shard Phoenix: Shard Phoenix deals 2 damage to each creature without flying.
{R}{R}{R}: Return Shard Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
title: Shard Phoenix

name: Shatter
text: Destroy target artifact.
flavor:
"Such fuss over machines, Gerrard. Remember that you are the prize of the Legacy. Throw away your toys!"
—Orim, Samite healer
title: Shatter

name: Sift
text: Draw three cards, then discard a card.
flavor:
"Twice I have let the Legacy slip away. Never again."
—Karn, silver golem
title: Sift

name: Silver Wyvern
text:
Flying
{U}: Change the target of target spell or ability that targets only Silver Wyvern. The new target must be a creature.
title: Silver Wyvern

name: Skyshaper
text: Sacrifice Skyshaper: Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.
flavor:
"It'll get us to the portal, but I can't guarantee what it'll do to the ship."
—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator
title: Skyshaper

name: Skyshroud Elf
text:
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
{1}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.
flavor:
"It is our duty to endure."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves
title: Skyshroud Elf

name: Skyshroud Forest
text:
Skyshroud Forest enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool. Skyshroud Forest deals 1 damage to you.
title: Skyshroud Forest

name: Skyshroud Troll
text: {1}{G}: Regenerate Skyshroud Troll.
flavor: The elves and merfolk have nothing but bitterness for each other. The trolls, however, find them both rather tasty.
title: Skyshroud Troll

name: Skyshroud Vampire
text:
Flying
Discard a creature card: Skyshroud Vampire gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor:
"If it tastes one drop of elvish blood I will cast it from the shroud to see it burn."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves
title: Skyshroud Vampire

name: Sliver Queen
text: {2}: Put a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor: Her children are ever part of her.
title: Sliver Queen

name: Smite
text: Destroy target blocked creature.
flavor:
"You've got your childhood wish at last. Now you get to die."
—Gerrard, to Volrath
title: Smite

name: Soltari Champion
text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Whenever Soltari Champion attacks, other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
title: Soltari Champion

name: Soltari Guerrillas
text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
{0}: The next time Soltari Guerrillas would deal combat damage to an opponent this turn, it deals that damage to target creature instead.
title: Soltari Guerrillas

name: Soltari Lancer
text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Soltari Lancer has first strike as long as it's attacking.
flavor:
"In times of war the victors rarely save their best for last."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight
title: Soltari Lancer

name: Soltari Monk
text:
Protection from black
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
flavor:
"Prayer rarely explains."
—Orim, Samite healer
title: Soltari Monk

name: Soltari Priest
text:
Protection from red
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
flavor: "In Rath," the priest said, "there is even greater need for prayer."
title: Soltari Priest

name: Soltari Trooper
text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Whenever Soltari Trooper attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Dauthi blood is soltari wine."
—Soltari Tales of Life
title: Soltari Trooper

name: Spell Blast
text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost X. (For example, if that spell's mana cost is {3}{U}{U}, X is 5.)
flavor: Call it the thinking mage's version of brute force.
title: Spell Blast

name: Spellshock
text: Whenever a player casts a spell, Spellshock deals 2 damage to that player.
flavor: A snap of fingers, a snap of teeth.
title: Spellshock

name: Spike Breeder
text:
Spike Breeder enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Breeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Breeder: Put a 1/1 green Spike creature token onto the battlefield.
title: Spike Breeder

name: Spike Colony
text:
Spike Colony enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Colony: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
title: Spike Colony

name: Spike Feeder
text:
Spike Feeder enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: You gain 2 life.
title: Spike Feeder

name: Spike Hatcher
text:
Spike Hatcher enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Hatcher: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Hatcher: Regenerate Spike Hatcher.
title: Spike Hatcher

name: Spinal Graft
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
title: Spinal Graft

name: Spined Sliver
text: Whenever a Sliver becomes blocked, that Sliver gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.
title: Spined Sliver

name: Spined Wurm
flavor:
"As it moved, the wurm's spines gathered up bits of flowstone, which took the shapes of dead villagers' heads. Each head spoke a single sound, but if taken together, they said, ‘Alas for the living.'"
—Dal myth of the wurm
title: Spined Wurm

name: Spirit en-Kor
text:
Flying
{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Spirit en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.
flavor:
Death free throat from thirst, mouth from speech, feet from earth.
—Kor requiem
title: Spirit en-Kor

name: Spirit Mirror
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no Reflection tokens on the battlefield, put a 2/2 white Reflection creature token onto the battlefield.
{0}: Destroy target Reflection.
title: Spirit Mirror

name: Spitting Hydra
text:
Spitting Hydra enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spitting Hydra: Spitting Hydra deals 1 damage to target creature.
title: Spitting Hydra

name: Stalking Stones
text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{6}: Stalking Stones becomes a 3/3 Elemental artifact creature that's still a land. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
title: Stalking Stones

name: Standing Troops
text: Vigilance
flavor: The less you have, the harder you fight for it.
title: Standing Troops

name: Starke of Rath
text: {T}: Destroy target artifact or creature. That permanent's controller gains control of Starke of Rath. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
flavor:
"I know to whom I owe the most loyalty, and I see him in the mirror every day."
—Starke
title: Starke of Rath

name: Staunch Defenders
text: When Staunch Defenders enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
flavor:
"Hold your position! Leave doubt for the dying!"
—Tahngarth of the Weatherlight
title: Staunch Defenders

name: Stronghold Assassin
text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonblack creature.
flavor: The assassin sees only throats and hears only heartbeats.
title: Stronghold Assassin

name: Stun
text:
Target creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"I concede it was a cheap shot, but it was the only one I could afford."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight
title: Stun

name: Survival of the Fittest
text: {G}, Discard a creature card: Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
title: Survival of the Fittest

name: Telethopter
text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Telethopter gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: After losing several of the devices to midair collisions, Greven forbade moggs from operating telethopters.
title: Telethopter

name: Thalakos Drifters
text: Discard a card: Thalakos Drifters gains shadow until end of turn. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
flavor: They drift in and out of shadow and ever on toward madness.
title: Thalakos Drifters

name: Thalakos Lowlands
text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool. Thalakos Lowlands doesn't untap during your next untap step.
title: Thalakos Lowlands

name: Thalakos Scout
text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Discard a card: Return Thalakos Scout to its owner's hand.
title: Thalakos Scout

name: Thalakos Seer
text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
When Thalakos Seer leaves the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor:
"You see our world when you shut your eyes so tightly that tiny shapes float before them."
—Lyna, to Ertai
title: Thalakos Seer

name: Thopter Squadron
text:
Flying
Thopter Squadron enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Thopter Squadron: Put a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
{1}, Sacrifice another Thopter: Put a +1/+1 counter on Thopter Squadron. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
title: Thopter Squadron

name: Thrull Surgeon
text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice Thrull Surgeon: Look at target player's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor: "Just take a little off the top."
title: Thrull Surgeon

name: Time Ebb
text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
flavor:
"Gone today, here tomorrow."
—Ertai, wizard adept
title: Time Ebb

name: Time Warp
text: Target player takes an extra turn after this one.
flavor:
"Let's do it again!"
—Squee, goblin cabin hand
title: Time Warp

name: Tradewind Rider
text:
Flying
{T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor: It is said that the wind will blow the world past if you wait long enough.
title: Tradewind Rider

name: Trained Armodon
flavor: These are its last days. Better to grow broad and heavy. Better that the enemy is crushed beneath its carcass.
title: Trained Armodon

name: Tranquility
text: Destroy all enchantments.
flavor:
"Peace will come, but whether born of harmony or entropy I cannot say."
—Oracle en-Vec
title: Tranquility

name: Twitch
text:
You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.
Draw a card.
flavor: Battles are won in nuance.
title: Twitch

name: Vampire Hounds
text: Discard a creature card: Vampire Hounds gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: The hounds' barks are a horrifying chorus of screams, moans, and whispers.
title: Vampire Hounds

name: Vec Townships
text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool. Vec Townships doesn't untap during your next untap step.
title: Vec Townships

name: Verdant Force
text: At the beginning of each upkeep, put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor:
Burl, scurf, and bower
Birth fern and flower.
title: Verdant Force

name: Verdant Touch
text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Target land becomes a 2/2 creature that's still a land. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
title: Verdant Touch

name: Verdigris
text: Destroy target artifact.
flavor:
"Only the most sophisticated inventions can survive nature's unsophisticated motivations."
—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator
title: Verdigris

name: Vhati il-Dal
text: {T}: Until end of turn, target creature has base power 1 or base toughness 1.
flavor:
"Sir, I just thought . . . ," explained Vhati.
"Don't think," interrupted Greven. "It doesn't suit you."
title: Vhati il-Dal

name: Victual Sliver
text: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: You gain 4 life."
flavor: "We are kinfolk," explained Karn to the sliver queen. "Just as you need your progeny to complete you, so do I need the pieces of the Legacy to make me whole."
title: Victual Sliver

name: Volrath's Curse
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. That creature's controller may sacrifice a permanent for that player to ignore this effect until end of turn.
{1}{U}: Return Volrath's Curse to its owner's hand.
title: Volrath's Curse

name: Volrath's Laboratory
text:
As Volrath's Laboratory enters the battlefield, choose a color and a creature type.
{5}, {T}: Put a 2/2 creature token of the chosen color and type onto the battlefield.
title: Volrath's Laboratory

name: Volrath's Stronghold
text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}{B}, {T}: Put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor: The seed of a world's evil.
title: Volrath's Stronghold

name: Wall of Blossoms
text:
Defender
When Wall of Blossoms enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: Each flower identical, every leaf and petal disturbingly exact.
title: Wall of Blossoms

name: Wall of Diffusion
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Wall of Diffusion can block creatures with shadow as though Wall of Diffusion had shadow.
flavor:
"The injury was being caught between this world and our own; the insult was to find walls within."
—Lyna, soltari emissary
title: Wall of Diffusion

name: Wall of Essence
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Wall of Essence is dealt combat damage, you gain that much life.
flavor:
The ceiling and the floor fell in love, but only the wall knew.
—Dal saying
title: Wall of Essence

name: Wall of Souls

Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Wall of Souls is dealt combat damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent.
flavor:

—Starke

flavor: Orim regarded Gerrard coolly. "You are like the drake," she said, her expression unchanging. "It works hard to maintain its position, but to us it seems to glide along effortlessly. You must do the same."
